data.name: TUTORIAL_1
data.value: Head for the stairway! As you go, you can attack enemies by pressing {0}! Enemies won't move or act until you do.

data.name: TUTORIAL_2
data.value: You can carry four items. The items you find on the floor have a variety of useful effects.

data.name: TUTORIAL_3
data.value: If you find an item, open the menu with {0}, then select the Items option to see what it does.

data.name: TUTORIAL_4
data.value: You can also open the Items menu directly with {0}.

data.name: TUTORIAL_5
data.value: In some areas, you will see a tile with a green arrow, called a Wonder Tile. Step on it to heal any stat changes.

data.name: TUTORIAL_6
data.value: Have questions about anything? You can check the controls by opening the menu with {0}, then selecting Others.

data.name: TUTORIAL_7
data.value: Team Mode will automatically activate for Boss Battles. While in Team Mode, you can control all team members!

data.name: TUTORIAL_8
data.value: You can toggle this mode anywhere by pressing {0}.

data.name: SHOP_INTRO_A
data.value: Welcome to the {0} Shop! ♪

data.name: SHOP_CONTINUE_A
data.value: May I help you with anything else?

data.name: SHOP_EXIT_A
data.value: Thanks! Please come again! ♪

data.name: SHOP_BUY_A
data.value: Very well! Feel free to examine my merchandise! ♪ (You can use {0} to choose more than one item.)

data.name: SHOP_BUY_MORE_A
data.value: Do you wish to buy anything else today?

data.name: SHOP_BUY_ONE_A
data.value: That {0}? That will be \uE024{1}\uE023. Is that to your liking?

data.name: SHOP_BUY_MANY_A
data.value: Altogether, that comes to \uE024{0}\uE023. Is that OK?

data.name: SHOP_BUY_CONFIRM_A
data.value: Thank you! All yours! ♪

data.name: SHOP_SELL_A
data.value: Very well! What will you sell? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: SHOP_SELL_MORE_A
data.value: Do you wish to sell anything else? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: SHOP_SELL_ONE_A
data.value: Your {0}? I can pay you \uE024{1}\uE023 for that. Will you sell it for that price?

data.name: SHOP_SELL_MANY_A
data.value: I can pay \uE024{0}\uE023 for everything. Is that acceptable?

data.name: SHOP_SELL_CONFIRM_A
data.value: Done deal! Thank you! ♪

data.name: SHOP_EMPTY_A_0
data.value: You know...[pause=0]I'm sold out. Please forgive me.

data.name: SHOP_EMPTY_A_1
data.value: I will have new merchandise for you tomorrow, I swear!

data.name: SHOP_NO_MONEY_A
data.value: What? [pause=0]You don't seem to have the money.

data.name: SHOP_MAX_MONEY_A_0
data.value: Goodness! You're overflowing with money!
data.comment: i have no idea if this is even possible in PMDO

data.name: SHOP_MAX_MONEY_A_1
data.value: You couldn't possibly carry any more money!

data.name: SHOP_SELL_CANCEL_A
data.value: Oh? [pause=0]Nothing to sell?

data.name: SHOP_SELL_NOTHING_A
data.value: Oh?[pause=0] You don't seem to have anything!

data.name: SHOP_BUY_NO_SPACE_A
data.value: Oh! [pause=0]You have no more space for items!

data.name: SHOP_EMPTY_A_0_ALT
data.value: Uh-oh![pause=0] No more merchandise!
data.comment: can't tell if this is unused or it's supposed to be for the purple kecleon

data.name: SHOP_EMPTY_A_1_ALT
data.value: I'm completely sold out!

data.name: SHOP_NO_MONEY_A_ALT
data.value: Oh![pause=0] Sorry, you don't seem to have enough money!

data.name: SHOP_UNSELLABLE_A
data.value: Oh my![pause=0] I couldn't possibly take that from you!
data.comment: i'm guessing this is for unique items

data.name: SHOP_MAX_MONEY_A_ALT
data.value: Oh my![pause=0] You can't carry any more money! Sorry, I can't complete the deal.

data.name: SHOP_INFO_A_0
data.value: We, the {0} Brothers, have a passion for selling items! ♪

data.name: SHOP_INFO_A_1
data.value: Items are useful for your dungeon adventures!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_A_2
data.value: Use items with imagination! And invent new uses for them!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_A_3
data.value: Ah, yes! If the shop sells out...

data.name: SHOP_INFO_A_4
data.value: We'll always have new things to sell on the next day!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_A_5
data.value: So spend time in dungeons until we restock! Visit us when you return! ♪

data.name: SHOP_INFO_A_6
data.value: Ah, yes! You can find our {0} Markets far and wide...

data.name: SHOP_INFO_A_7
data.value: Even in dungeons! Visit us everywhere!

data.name: SHOP_INTRO_B
data.value: Welcome to {0} Wares, where you can find Orbs and TMs! ♪

data.name: SHOP_CONTINUE_B
data.value: May I assist you in any other way?

data.name: SHOP_EXIT_B
data.value: Thanks! Please come again! ♪

data.name: SHOP_BUY_B
data.value: Ah, very well! Take a look at my merchandise. All chosen with pride! ♪ (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: SHOP_BUY_MORE_B
data.value: Do you wish to purchase anything else?

data.name: SHOP_BUY_ONE_B
data.value: That {0}? That will be \uE024{1}\uE023. Is that acceptable?

data.name: SHOP_BUY_MANY_B
data.value: Altogether, that comes to \uE024{0}\uE023. Is that OK?

data.name: SHOP_BUY_CONFIRM_B
data.value: Thank you! Well chosen! ♪

data.name: SHOP_SELL_B
data.value: Ah, very well! What do you wish to sell? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: SHOP_SELL_MORE_B
data.value: Is there anything else that you wish to sell? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: SHOP_SELL_ONE_B
data.value: Your {0}? I can offer \uE024{1}\uE023. Will you sell it for that price?

data.name: SHOP_SELL_MANY_B
data.value: I will pay \uE024{0}\uE023 for everything you're offering. Is that acceptable?

data.name: SHOP_SELL_CONFIRM_B
data.value: We have a deal! Thank you! ♪

data.name: SHOP_EMPTY_B_0
data.value: You know...[pause=0]I'm sold out. So sorry, my friend.

data.name: SHOP_EMPTY_B_1
data.value: Tomorrow! Tomorrow I shall have more wares!

data.name: SHOP_NO_MONEY_B
data.value: Oh?[pause=0] You seem short on money, my friend.

data.name: SHOP_MAX_MONEY_B_0
data.value: Oh! You're carrying too much money, my friend!
data.comment: i have no idea if this is even possible in PMDO

data.name: SHOP_MAX_MONEY_B_1
data.value: You can't hold any more!

data.name: SHOP_SELL_CANCEL_B
data.value: Oh? [pause=0]You don't seem to have anything that you can sell.

data.name: SHOP_SELL_NOTHING_B
data.value: Oh? [pause=0]You seem to have nothing, my friend.

data.name: SHOP_BUY_NO_SPACE_B
data.value: Oh![pause=0] You've run out of space for any more of my wares, my friend!

data.name: SHOP_EMPTY_B_0_ALT
data.value: Oh?[pause=0] My shelves are bare of wares!

data.name: SHOP_EMPTY_B_1_ALT
data.value: I am completely sold out, friend!

data.name: SHOP_NO_MONEY_B_ALT
data.value: Oh! [pause=0]You're short on money, my friend!

data.name: SHOP_UNSELLABLE_B
data.value: Whoa![pause=0] I... I can't accept anything like that!

data.name: SHOP_MAX_MONEY_B_ALT
data.value: Oh no![pause=0] My friend, you cannot add to your money! I cannot do this.

data.name: SHOP_INFO_B_0
data.value: Pokémon moves...[pause=0]are the path to ultimate power!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_B_1
data.value: Smash walls![pause=0] Fly![pause=0] So many moves. All dynamic, each elegant in its way!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_B_2
data.value: And some moves, obscure and rare, are...[pause=0]simply beautiful!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_B_3
data.value: We sell many moves daily![pause=0] They can be learned using our Technical Machines, or TMs for short!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_B_4
data.value: You see? Isn't it exciting? It's the stuff of dreams!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_B_5
data.value: Why, it gets me so excited that I've taken on a rosy hue!

data.name: SHOP_INFO_B_6
data.value: I do hope you will shop at our market. Visit my elder brother and me!

data.name: STORAGE_INTRO
data.value: Hello, there! Welcome to {0} Storage.

data.name: STORAGE_CONTINUE
data.value: Anything else, dear?

data.name: STORAGE_EXIT
data.value: Thanks, sweetie! Come again!

data.name: STORAGE_STORE
data.value: What would you like to store? (You can use {0} to choose more than one item, or {1} and {2} to select everything.)

data.name: STORAGE_STORE_MORE
data.value: Care to store anything else?

data.name: STORAGE_STORE_ONE
data.value: I'll put your {0} in storage, OK?

data.name: STORAGE_STORE_MANY
data.value: I'll put the items you chose in storage, OK?

data.name: STORAGE_STORE_CONFIRM
data.value: OK, stored away! You can count on me, honey.

data.name: STORAGE_TAKE
data.value: What will you take out? (You can use {0} to choose more than one item.)

data.name: STORAGE_TAKE_MORE
data.value: Care to take out anything else?

data.name: STORAGE_TAKE_ONE
data.value: I'll take your {0} out of storage, OK?

data.name: STORAGE_TAKE_MANY
data.value: I'll take the items you chose out of storage, OK?

data.name: STORAGE_TAKE_CONFIRM
data.value: There you go, sweetie!

data.name: STORAGE_NO_ITEMS
data.value: Oh? You don't seem to have anything.

data.name: STORAGE_FULL_ITEMS
data.value: Oh? You don't have the room to carry any more items, dear.

data.name: STORAGE_EMPTY
data.value: Oh? You don't have anything stored, dear.

data.name: STORAGE_UNSTOREABLE
data.value: Sorry, dear. You can't put that {0} in storage.
data.comment: Unique Item (?)

data.name: STORAGE_MAX_ITEM
data.value: Sorry, dear. I can't take any more of that item.

data.name: STORAGE_NO_SPACE
data.value: Sorry, dear. I've run out of storage space.
data.comment: Impossible in PMDO since the arbitrary limit is removed

data.name: STORAGE_INFO_0
data.value: I can store items that you found in dungeons or that you bought from shops.

data.name: STORAGE_INFO_1
data.value: If you faint in a dungeon, some of your items will be lost...
data.comment: False advertising (for now) since PMDO removes ALL items

data.name: STORAGE_INFO_2
data.value: But anything that you have put in storage will be safe.

data.name: STORAGE_INFO_3
data.value: I keep watch over the storage space, so anything you leave here won't ever disappear!

data.name: STORAGE_INFO_4
data.value: If you have any items that you can't bear to lose, be sure to leave them with me!

data.name: STORAGE_NO_ITEMS_ALT
data.value: Oh? I'm afraid you don't have any items to be stored, dear.

data.name: BANK_INTRO_0
data.value: Welcome to {0} Bank!

data.name: BANK_INTRO_1A
data.value: How may I help? Hee-hee...
data.comment: Triggers when the player has no saved money

data.name: BANK_INTRO_1B
data.value: Your bank balance is \uE024{0}\uE023. Now, how may I serve you? Hee-hee...

data.name: BANK_INFO_0
data.value: Did you know that if you fall in a dungeon, half of your money will be spirited away, never to be found again? Hee-hee...
data.comment: False Advertising (for now) again, PMDO takes ALL money

data.name: BANK_INFO_1
data.value: Avoid that fate...[pause=0]hee-hee...[pause=0] by leaving your money in {0} Bank.

data.name: BANK_INFO_2
data.value: Then, if you are defeated in a dungeon, you'll find your money safe and sound with me.

data.name: BANK_INFO_3
data.value: I admit that I may appear\nrather sinister...[pause=0]hee-hee...

data.name: BANK_INFO_4
data.value: But don't judge me by my looks! I'm hauntingly honest...[pause=0]hee-hee!

data.name: BANK_INFO_5
data.value: So leave your money with me. It will rest in peace...[pause=0]hee-hee!

data.name: BANK_EXIT
data.value: I look forward to your next visit! Hee-hee!

data.name: BANK_CANCEL
data.value: You wish to cancel. All right.

data.name: BANK_NO_MONEY
data.value: What?[pause=0] Oh, deepest sorrow! You have no money!

data.name: BANK_MAX_MONEY_0
data.value: Whoooa! What a vast stash of money you have here![pause=0] Our safe is about to burst! Hee-hee!
data.comment: i have no idea if this is even possible in PMDO

data.name: BANK_MAX_MONEY_1
data.value: Unfortunately, we can't take any more.

data.name: BANK_DEPOSIT
data.value: How much do you want to deposit?

data.name: BANK_DEPOSIT_CONFIRM
data.value: \uE024{0}\uE023! It will rest here in peace. Forever, if you wish. Hee-hee!

data.name: BANK_MAX_PURSE
data.comment: i have no idea if this is even possible in PMDO
data.value: What?[pause=0] I'm sorry, but you can't carry any more money! [pause=0]There's not even a ghost of a chance! Hee-hee!

data.name: BANK_NO_BALANCE
data.value: What?[pause=0] I'm sorry to say that you have no money here. Your vault is barren!

data.name: BANK_WITHDRAWL
data.value: How much will you withdraw?

data.name: BANK_WITHDRAWL_CONFIRM
data.value: \uE024{0}\uE023? OK, here it is!

data.name: DAYCARE_NO_EGG_A_0
data.value: {0} Day Care welcomes you! ♪[pause=0] I love taking care of Eggs! ♪
data.comment: Triggers with first interaction

data.name: DAYCARE_NO_EGG_A_1
data.value: If you ever get an Egg, I'll watch it for you! ♪[pause=0] I'll care for it as if it were my very own! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_NO_EGG_A_2
data.value: I've heard that you can get Eggs as rewards for missions sometimes. ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_NO_EGG_A_3
data.value: So, if you want an Egg, go on lots of missions! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_NO_EGG_B_0
data.comment: Triggers after player already hatched an egg
data.value: This is {0} Day Care! I'll take care of any more Eggs that you get!

data.name: DAYCARE_NO_EGG_B_1
data.value: I've heard that you can get Eggs as rewards for doing missions sometimes! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_NO_EGG_B_2
data.value: So, if you want an Egg, go on lots of missions! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_INTRO
data.value: I'm looking after your Egg! ♪ It's doing fabulously well! ♪
data.comment: Only triggers if you have an egg

data.name: DAYCARE_EXIT
data.value: Please come back another time to check on it! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_INFO_1
data.value: {0} Day Care takes Eggs and looks after them for Pokémon! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_INFO_2
data.value: I'm responsible for caring for Eggs, raising them as if they were my own! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_INFO_3
data.value: I hope you're as excited as I am to know what's growing inside your Egg! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_INFO_4
data.value: I've heard that you can get Eggs as rewards for missions sometimes. ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_INFO_5
data.value: So, if you want an Egg, go on lots of missions! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_CHECK_0
data.value: Huh...?[pause=0] The Egg...
data.comment: Sound effect plays at the beginning

data.name: DAYCARE_CHECK_1
data.value: Is it...?[pause=0] Could it be...?[pause=0] Is it close to hatching?

data.name: DAYCARE_CHECK_2
data.value: Could it...?!

data.name: DAYCARE_CHECK_3
data.value: Will it...?!

data.name: DAYCARE_HATCHED_0
data.value: Huh...?[pause=0] What?
data.comment: Sound effect plays at the end

data.name: DAYCARE_HATCHED_1
data.value: The Egg...[pause=0]hatched!
data.comment: Menu sound effect plays before "hatched"

data.name: DAYCARE_HATCHED_2
data.value: A healthy {0}![pause=0] Look! See it smile? It's adorable! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_HATCHED_3
data.value: Oh? The {0} wants to join your team! ♪[pause=0] What will you do?

data.name: DAYCARE_WAIT_0
data.value: Hmmm...[pause=0] Well...[pause=0] Not quite yet...

data.name: DAYCARE_WAIT_1
data.value: Give it a little more time, then come by for another look! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_RECRUIT_PROMPT
data.value: Accept {0} into the team?

data.name: DAYCARE_RECRUIT_DENY_0
data.value: You didn't accept the baby Pokémon for your exploration team.

data.name: DAYCARE_RECRUIT_DENY_1
data.value: So {0} went off, happy and carefree!

data.name: DAYCARE_RECRUIT_ACCEPT_0
data.value: {0} joined the team!

data.name: DAYCARE_RECRUIT_ACCEPT_1
data.value: {0} is happy to be a member!

data.name: DAYCARE_RECRUIT_ACCEPT_2
data.value: {0} went off to be a part of your {1} Assembly roster.

data.name: DAYCARE_HOLDING_ITEM_0
data.value: Huh? Well, this is unusual![pause=0]The baby is holding a special item!

data.name: DAYCARE_HOLDING_ITEM_1
data.value: You should think about keeping that item with you! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_HOLDING_ITEM_2
data.comment: Only happens when bag is full
data.value: Or that's what I would suggest, if you had the room for it.

data.name: DAYCARE_HOLDING_ITEM_3
data.value: You don't, so I'll take it over to storage for you later! ♪

data.name: DAYCARE_NICKNAME_PROMPT
data.value: A new member joined the team! Give {0} a nickname?

data.name: DAYCARE_UNK
data.value: You do NOT want to throw that out!
data.comment: not sure what this is used for

data.name: DAYCARE_UNK2
data.value: Refused to take {0} as a member.
data.comment: unused..?

data.name: SWAP_INTRO
data.value: Meh-heh-heh. Welcome to the {0} Swap Shop. Want to swap? It'll cost ya \uE024{1}\uE023.

data.name: SWAP_CONTINUE
data.value: Meh-heh-heh. Anything else you wanna swap?

data.name: SWAP_NO_MONEY
data.value: Meh-heh-heh...[pause=0] Hey, hold it! No money, no swap. Got that?

data.name: SWAP_CANT_AFFORD_0
data.value: Didn't I tell ya? It's \uE024{0}\uE023 for every swap. Meh-heh-heh!

data.name: SWAP_CANT_AFFORD_1
data.value: That means you don't have the money to do it right now!

data.name: SWAP_CANT_SWAP
data.value: Let me take a look... Nope, you don't have a set of swappable items. Meh-heh.

data.name: SWAP_EMPTY_0
data.value: Meh-heh-heh. Sorry...

data.name: SWAP_EMPTY_1
data.value: It looks like there's nobody to trade with now.

data.name: SWAP_EXCHANGE
data.value: So which Exclusive Item do you want?

data.name: SWAP_CANCEL
data.value: You don't wanna? Meh-heh-heh!

data.name: SWAP_SURPRISE
data.value: What...? [pause=0]Whoa!
data.comment: Not sure where this is used

data.name: SWAP_TWO
data.value: So you wanna swap your {0} and {1} for that?

data.name: SWAP_THREE
data.value: So you wanna swap your {0}, {1}, and {2} for that?

data.name: SWAP_MANY
data.value: So you wanna swap your {0} Exclusive Items, then?

data.name: SWAP_CONFIRM
data.value: It'll cost \uE024{0}\uE023. OK?

data.name: SWAP_PROCEED_0
data.value: Let's do this swap then! Meh-heh-heh!

data.name: SWAP_PROCEED_1
data.value: {0} put the Exclusive Items in the Swap Cauldron.
data.comment: Sound effect plays before "Exclusive Items"

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_COMMON_0
data.value: Meh-heh-heh![pause=0] Seems to me your swap went off without a hitch!

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_COMMON_1
data.value: Those Exclusive Items you swapped got you this {0}.

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_COMMON_2
data.value: I'd say it's pretty rare. Treat it with care. Meh-heh-heh!!

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_COMMON_3
data.value: {0} accepted the {1}.
data.comment: {0} is the player's name, menu sound effect plays before item string

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_RARE_0
data.value: Meh-heh-heh![pause=0] Seems that we brewed up a successful swap there!

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_RARE_1
data.value: What? [pause=0]What's that?! {0}?! I must be hallucinating!

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_RARE_2
data.value: That's unbelievably valuable![pause=0] So incredibly special!

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_RARE_3
data.value: I rarely see something so valuable! Treat it with respect! Meh-heh-heh!

data.name: SWAP_SUCCESS_RARE_4
data.value: {0} accepted the extremely rare and precious {1}!
data.comment: {0} is the player's name, menu sound effect plays before item string

data.name: SWAP_BAG_FULL_0
data.value: ...But you can't take it. Not when you don't have room for it! Meh-heh-heh.

data.name: SWAP_BAG_FULL_1
data.value: So I'll send it to your storage later. You be sure to check on it.

data.name: SWAP_INFO_0
data.value: See the Swap Cauldron behind me? When ya throw in some Exclusive Items...

data.name: SWAP_INFO_1
data.value: They're swapped for one Exclusive Item offered up by another Pokémon.

data.name: SWAP_INFO_2
data.value: But you have to put in a set of swappable items!

data.name: SWAP_INFO_3
data.value: Don't worry. It's worth it. You can get back rare items in swaps.

data.name: SWAP_INFO_4
data.value: Count on it! Meh-heh-heh!

data.name: SWAP_ITEM_INFO_0
data.value: If you look up the Info on items, the ones that are Exclusive Items will have this \uE10C mark on them.

data.name: SWAP_ITEM_INFO_1
data.value: You'll need a set of items with the \uE10C mark to do the swap.

data.name: SWAP_ITEM_INFO_2
data.value: Let me give you an example.[pause=0] Let's say you have a {0} and a {1)...
data.comment: {0} = Shinx Claw, {1} = Shinx Fang

data.name: SWAP_ITEM_INFO_3
data.value: You could swap them for a {0}. Get it?
data.comment: {0} = Flash Tag

data.name: SWAP_ITEM_INFO_4
data.value: Also,[pause=0] you don't have to be limited to just your Treasure Bag...

data.name: SWAP_ITEM_INFO_5
data.value: You can trade the Exclusive Items in your storage as well.

data.name: SWAP_ITEM_INFO_6
data.value: So you don't have to worry about dragging things out of your storage and lugging them all the way here.

data.name: SWAP_ITEM_INFO_7
data.value: Keep at your exploration thing so you can do better swaps, OK? Meh-heh-heh!

data.name: SWAP_TEAM_INFO_0
data.value: Which Exclusive Items will have an effect on you or your team...?[pause=0] You can view them in a list.

data.name: SWAP_TEAM_INFO_1
data.value: If you see an Exclusive Item you want on the list...[pause=0]then of course you can trade for it!

data.name: SWAP_EXIT
data.value: Come again! Meh-heh-heh!

data.name: SWAP_EXCHANGE_ITEMS
data.value: OK, so which Exclusive Items are you offering in return?

data.name: SWAP_MEMBERS
data.value: Whose list of Exclusive Items do you want to see?

data.name: SWAP_MEMBER_LIST
data.value: Here's a list of Exclusive Items that {0} can use.

data.name: SWAP_MEMBERS_CONTINUE
data.value: Would you like to see anyone else's Exclusive Items list?

data.name: SWAP_INFO_PROMPT
data.value: What information would you like to get?
